parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the numerical index for the distribution region of this copy of [[<template><title>arma1</title></template>]].
# USA
# Rest of the world

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[distributionRegion]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[distributionRegion]] == 1) [[then]] { [[hint]] "miles"; } [[else]] { [[hint]] "kilometres"; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[productVersion]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
